title: Give us one free dodge in our promos
body:
Don't even try to bullshit me. You, me, everyone --- we've all been in our promo games only to find the Smite/Clease Ashe Support and the Smite/Cleanse Blitzcrank Jungle typing "let's feed the shit out of this one bois" in chat.

Come on, now. I would prefer dodging not hold the weight of a total loss, at least one time in my promos.  Thanks.

replies.body: There should be room for 1 dodge during promos. I have no clue how many times I've seen players outright admit they were going to troll a person in promos. OFC you can screenshot that and send it to support, it doesn't stop being forced into a match to lose or having to dodge to lose.
YES
Pls... had to dodge the deciding game of my series a couple weeks ago due to my jungle insta locking soraka with cleanse and ghost because they were butthurt Kai’Sa got banned... yay?
NO
Why not?

> [{quoted}](name=bloxiefox,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E9nAB64Q,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-07-16T03:56:49.124+0000)
>
> Because trolling is a part of the game. Get used to it. Remember, when you dodge you are also denying the enemy team the chance to play the game.

So you've just accepted it as part of the game. It's not "part of the game," it's what players are making _of_ the game--there's a difference.

Sure, when you dodge you _do_ deny the enemy team a chance to play but they have no penalties. Nothing is stopping them from simply requeuing but on the other hand, you will have a leave timer and a loss in your promos.
Remove Promos

The free win you get for your second promo is already a kind of "free dodge", but better. Imho it would be too redundant to allow a free dodge in promos. And it doesn't happen so often that someone blatantly trolls, it is not in their advantage. 

Maybe allow one free dodge but remove the free win ?
Agreed as fuck
I'd go so far to say one free ranked dodge a day or every two days or so. There's simply no way to overcome people holding lobbies hostage.
Disconnecting during champ select = hahahahahahaha no promotion for you
Yes please.

As much as I hate the idea of this, and how it could probably be abused, Yes please make it a thing. I do not care about the abuse of it, this needs to be a thing. You can generally tell in champ select who is toxic, and in Promos, having the ability to just not play with that person in what would be a 20 minutes autoloss, that would be fantastic, especially in a 5 game series.
As "just one time" doesn't sound like much you forget how many people are in promos at the same time with their "just one time". THis could lead to massive dodges.
Just don't care about winning or losing promo. If you feel like you should dodge, then dodge. It is not gonna fuck up your MMR, and that's what's important.
